name: DEFYCA
intro: Institutional-grade trading venue for tokenized private debt
introduce: DEFYCA has developed a blockchain protocol that enables digital and crypto investors to invest in traditional debt securities and loan portfolios via tokenized assets. On the DEFYCA protocol, tokenized assets are issued, securitized, and structured into liquid pools, which can be traded instantly and with no friction. Price discovery, liability matching, settlement, and payment flows are executed automatically through smart contracts.
